page.title: 13A School History
page.content:
{1904:}St Anthony's RC Junior, Scotland Road opened and soon had 386 on roll. { {1909:}24 pupils left in Aug & Sept as their families fled the street riots. { {1914:}46 transferred to newly-built St Gerards on June 2 but numbers on roll remained high due to new arrivals. { } {1926:}404 in total,the top years split into 3 forms with 56 in the smallest.
{1939-1945:}Evacuation,air raids & home teaching made numbers during the war difficult to record but on{7/1/1941}a reduction was logged because of "the destruction of homes by enemy action"
Numbers were high during{ 50's & 60's but depopulation took hold in{ 70's so that the total is 90 now in{1985
